main: Standard Heishou mechanic: Using S3 or defense gives a 3 turn buff corresponding to their Heishou Pack. {status:LegStrength} gives her 5 {status:Agility} every turn. All her skills gain more Power or damage based on speed and some get additional buffs at 10+ speed (S1 and S3 gain coin reuse, S2 and S3 gain more damage, S2 inflicts 1 more {status:Burst} Count).
Standard Heishou mechanic: Combos with {identity:10613}'s S3. The buff gives him +5% bonus damage if his speed is faster than his target's.
other: Inflicts {status:BurstAgility} with her S3, which inflicts +1 {status:Burst} Count when triggering {status:Burst} at 10+ speed and deals additional {keyword:Gluttony} damage based on {status:Burst} when fully consumed. The coin reuse on her S3 inflicts an additional stack of {status:BurstAgility} after she fully consumes the stack inflicted by the first coin.
Her passive gives bonus damage if she has {status:LegStrength} or if her target has {status:BurstAgility}.

1041101.desc: If this unit has [LegStrength], deal +5% damage
1041101.name: Heishou Mutation [Mao]

1041111.desc:
If this unit has [LegStrength], deal +5% damage
If the target has [BurstAgility], deal +5% damage
1041111.name: Heishou Mutation [Mao]

1041121.desc: Turn End: 1 ally with the fastest Speed gains 2 [Agility] next turn
1041121.name: Partial Heishou Mutation Training
